thread.section_title: Technology news, features, analysis and commentary - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Microsoft rolls out tablets, phones to push Windows 10 ecosystem
thread.title_full: Microsoft rolls out tablets, phones to push Windows 10 ecosystem - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Microsoft rolls out tablets, phones to push Windows 10 ecosystem
text:
Photo: Andrew Burton, Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - OCTOBER 06: Microsoft Corporate Vice President Panos Panay introduces a new tablet titled the Microsoft Surface Pro 4 at a media event for new Microsoft products on October 6, 2015 in New York City. Microsoft also unveiled a virtual reality head set titled the HoloLens, a phone titled the Lumia 950, a laptop titled the Surface Book and a biometrics wristband titled the Band 2. (Photo by Andrew Burton/Getty Images) NEW YORK, NY - OCTOBER 06: Microsoft Corporate Vice President...
In a relatively new strategy for the company, Microsoft is using its own hardware to lure people to its software.
